full_description:
Anker SoundBuds Slim Bluetooth Neckband

The Anker SoundBuds Slim Bluetooth Neckband are wireless earphones that provide a pleasant and easy method to listen to music and make phone calls. With a weight of only 16g / 0.56oz, they offer a small and lightweight design. They also include a flexible neckband that adjusts to the shape and size of your neck, as well as magnetic Neckband that attach to one another while not in use. The Anker SoundBuds Slim Bluetooth Neckband feature a battery capacity of 110mAh and a play life of 7 hours. They also feature quick charging, which provides an additional hour of play time in only 10 minutes. The IPX7 waterproof classification means the Neckband can withstand sweat and rain, making them appropriate for any activity and weather. The Anker SoundBuds Slim Bluetooth Neckband have a 6mm driver that produces crisp, balanced sound with a frequency response of 20Hz-20KHz. They also have an impedance of 16, ensuring a consistent and efficient performance. Bluetooth 4.1 technology is used in the earphones, which ensures a stable and smooth connection with your devices. The Anker SoundBuds Slim Bluetooth Neckband also have a range of 10m / 33ft, allowing you to walk about without losing the signal.

full_description:
Anker Soundcore Spirit Pro Bluetooth Neckband

The Anker Soundcore Spirit Pro Bluetooth Neckband is a set of wireless neckband that provide a long-lasting and comfortable method to listen to music and make phone calls. They have an IP68 classification, indicating that they are waterproof and dustproof and can survive harsh environments. They also contain SweatGuard technology, which keeps perspiration and moisture at bay, making them suitable for any sport or activity. The 6 mm drivers in the neckband produce crystal-clear music with richer bass. They also offer two EQ settings, which let you quickly switch between balanced and bass-boosted sounds. The neckband supports Bluetooth codecs such as aptX, AAC, and SBC, ensuring high-quality sound transmission and compatibility with your devices. Bluetooth 4.2 technology is included in the Neckband, which ensures a solid and quick connection with your devices. The battery life of the neckband is up to 10 hours at 60% volume, which may keep you engaged for hours. Anker Soundcore Spirit Pro Bluetooth Neckband also has a rapid charge option that adds an hour of gameplay in only 15 minutes. The Neckband includes a built-in microphone and a 3-button controller, allowing you to easily manage your music, calls, and voice assistant. The Anker Soundcore Spirit Pro Bluetooth Neckband also has a flexible neckband that adjusts to the shape and size of your neck, as well as magnetic neckband that attach to each other while not in use.

full_description:
Anker Soundcore R500 Wireless in-ear Neckband Earphone

The Anker SoundCore R500 Wireless Neckband Earphone has 10mm drivers to deliver the immersive trademark HD sound. The collar neckband enhances the listening experience with deep, strong, and balanced bass, making it ideal for bass-obsessed audiophiles. According to the firm, the bass suits many music types and frequencies. On a single charge, it provides 20 hours of entertainment for all-day use. Fast charging (USB-C) is supported, which equates to a 10-minute charge for a 3-hour playtime. With an AI-powered microphone that helps you to hear and be heard clearly, the R500 provides a greater calling experience. The inbuilt remote control with two buttons provides a hands-free user experience. The Anker Soundcore R500 Neckband Earphone comes with an 18months warranty.

Anker Soundcore Life U2i Wireless Neckband

The Anker Soundcore Life U2i Wireless Neckband with Experience clean highs,  lively mids, and lots of strong bass with 10mm graphene drivers. Soundcore's Life U2i Bluetooth headphones use a unique algorithm to produce a wide dynamic range and powerful bass. When fully charged, the Life U2i provides a total of 22 hours of enjoyment. A 10-minute charge provides 3 hours of listening time. They also include higher call quality and a built-in microphone with an AI system that exactly picks up your speech, so you can enjoy crystal clear calls when you're out and about! The earphones were also created with a curved neckband and super light materials to allow flexibility, so the Life U2i wireless headphones would feel as if they were never there. The Life U2i, which is water and sweat-resistant to IPX5, is an excellent choice for your active lifestyle.
